column1: The Purple Pig////Probably one of the more upscale places I wouldn't have imagined going to. I came across this place a few days before my friend and I took our trip to Chicago. It ended up becoming one of her friend's recommendations for must try places. So
column2: one nigh we decided to just go for it since we were in the area. The wait time for a table of two was about an hour. To kill some time
column3: we ended up walking around before indulging. We got seated promptly and the atmosphere was dimmed
column4: but made it feel like a very lively outting- in. The waitress let me sample 3-4 different types of wine just to figure out my preference and she was more than accommodating in helping me select the right one.
